nodes.text: Honarius Hanast was the leader of a group of pilgrims from the Fellowship of Kooroo. They contracted a group of free-traders to transport them to the planet Gelgelar. During the trip, one of the pilgrims disappeared only to be found dead, crammed into a maintenance shaft on the ship. Hanast later approached the free-traders to enlist their help because another of their number, Dorius Drevin, had gone missing. Drevin was in reality a bounty hunter looking to collect the bounty on Loro Ecls.
